description: This table contains the items for dental teeth records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: DENTAL_TOOTH_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current status of the tooth


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Missing


Erupted


Unerupted


Partially Erupted


Bridged


Implant


Denture


Other

columns.name: ANATOMY_ACTIVE_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a tooth should be shown in the tooth chart.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inactive


Active

columns.name: ANATOMY_TEMPL_ID
columns.description: Identifier of the anatomy template associated with this record.
